com.googlecode.aluminumproject.cache

Class MemoryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.cache.MemoryCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache, ConfigurationElement

    public class MemoryCache
extends Object
implements Cache
    An in-memory cache implementation. It does not have any configuration parameters.

      • storeTemplate

        public void storeTemplate(Cache.Key key,
                 Template template)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Stores a template under a certain key. When a template had already been stored under the given key, it is replaced.
        Specified by:
        storeTemplate in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        key - the key to store the template under
        template - the template to store

      • findTemplate

        public Template findTemplate(Cache.Key key)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Finds a template by its key. When this cache does not contain the given key, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        findTemplate in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        key - the key to find a template by
        Returns:
        the template with the given key or null if no template was stored under the key given
